original_text: ‘The Israelites must eat the Passover meal at the proper time. They must eat it as the rules about it say.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 유월절을 그 정한 기일에 지키게 하라

sentences.original_text: The Israelites must eat the Passover meal
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들은 유월절 식사를 먹어야 한다

sentences.original_text: as the rules about it say
